titles.title: A resolution recognizing the importance of the blueberry industry to the United States and designating July 2020 as "National Blueberry Month".
A resolution recognizing the importance of the blueberry industry to the United States and designating July 2020 as "National Blueberry Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution (1) designates July 2020 as National Blueberry Month; and (2) recognizes the contributions of blueberry growers in the United States and their families, and that purchasing blueberries grown in the United States supports farmers, jobs, and the economy of the United States.
